backend/main.mo: IC backend actor handling admin auth, token sessions, default admin bootstrap, and order/user profile storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin‑auth stability requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in UI, admin flows, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, OG/Twitter tags, Inter font, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component switching between home and admin views and managing the order dialog state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBoots: UI for initial admin‑account creation with credential display, copy actions, and bootstrap flow handling.
Gate component that decides between bootstrap, login, or authenticated admin views based on session and setup state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Admin login form handling email/password authentication with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersAdmi: Admin dashboard for viewing, filtering, downloading, and deleting orders with dialogs and status handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingAdm: Empty file placeholder for an admin pricing editor component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with optional return-to-login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing company info, contact details, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with navigation links and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderDialo: Dialog for placing orders and showing post‑submission success state with order reference.
Order submission form handling service selection, user details, optional file upload, and mutation call.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders a simple About section describing the agency and its mission.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details including founder, location, and email inside a card layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, headline text, and buttons that trigger scroll or order actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows a grid of predefined portfolio items with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Pricing: Empty placeholder file for a future pricing section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists services from serviceCatalog and provides order buttons, supporting scroll reference forwarding.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays reasons to choose the agency using icon cards with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/services/service: Exports an array of service definitions including ids, titles, descriptions, and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides admin login/logout logic using the actor and manages session state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Handles admin bootstrap flow including checking existence and creating a default admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Tracks and exposes admin session state using adminSession subscriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login flow. Includes helper functions to create an AuthClient and expose login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, downloading, and deleting orders with admin token handling. Wraps actor calls with error normalization and session validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, base typography, and utility animations. Establishes global design tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the root App component with global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with logout, username display, and order management within an access gate. Includes navigation back to the main site.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page layout composing sections like hero, services, and contact with smooth scrolling and order dialog management. Passes navigation and dialog control props.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session data in sessionStorage with listeners, expiry handling, and helpers for token and username retrieval. Provides set, clear, and subscribe functions.
frontend/src/utils/adminTokenError.ts: Detects explicit admin token authentication errors by matching known backend error messages. Used to identify invalid or expired sessions.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File or Blob into a Uint8Array using FileReader. Supports file uploads to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support and session-backed storage. Helps manage tokens and other transient URL data.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Normalizes unknown errors to safe English-only messages with mappings for common cases and strips emojis as a fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color system, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking scope, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the PIXEL NOVA DIGITALS site.
